snippet: To get to the Long Island shores in the summer, many revelers brave jitneys, cram into trains or glide above the traffic in chartered helicopters.
abstract: Hampton Jitney, which has 50 buses in its fleet and 200 employees on its payroll, is a popular choice of transit for people traveling between Manhattan and the Hamptons; the Jitney offers two classes of service: the regular Jitney and the more expensive Ambassador, which offers more comfortable seats and wine to its passengers.
lead_paragraph: To get to the Long Island shores in the summer, many revelers brave jitneys, cram into trains or glide above the traffic in chartered helicopters.

headline.seo: Escape to the Hamptons, by Jitney, Train or Copter
headline.main: To the Hamptons, and Step on It!
headline.print_headline: To the Hamptons, and Step on It!
